Plot: Wally Sparks is a tabloid TV show reporter who's trying to boost ratings on his show. He goes to the governor's mansion to uncover a sex scandal.
Title: Meet Wally Sparks
Writer: Harry Basil (story), Rodney Dangerfield (screenplay), Harry Basil (screenplay)
Actors: Rodney Dangerfield, Debi Mazar, David Ogden Stiers, Burt Reynolds
